msbt.message: Hey! I heard you're getting stuff together to build us a shop! Good hustle, !
Let me know if there's anything heavy I can lift, !
I found something that might help things along. Here you go!
I was gonna make those iron nuggets into some free weights, but having a shop sounds way cooler.The faster we get a shop, the faster I can just BUY free weights! Go Team , !
I was gonna make that iron nugget into an extra-heavy free weight, but having a shop sounds way cooler.The faster we get a shop, the faster I can just BUY free weights! Go Team , !
Yo, ! I heard that you've been helping build us a shop.You're gonna be 's MVP in no time, !
Yo, ! I heard you helped get our shop going.Way to take into the big leagues, !
Anyway, I just wanted to shout my thanks at you, . So<10_10 />THANK YOU!
I found something that I thought might make a good thank-you gift. You've earned it!

I was gonna make those iron nuggets into free weightsbut if we've got a shop, I can just BUY free weights!Anyway, they mean a lot to me 'cause of how heavy they are, so take good care of 'em, !Go Team !
I was gonna make that iron nugget into a free weightbut if we've got a shop, I can just BUY free weights!Anyway, it meant a lot to me 'cause of how heavy it is, so take good care of it, !Go Team !
What's up, ! Word is you're gonna pump up the island for a K.K. Slider show!
What's up, ! Word is you've been pumping up the island for a K.K. Slider show!
K.K.'s songs are the best. I play 'em during cardio, on my jogs, when I'm trying to fall asleep ALL the time!
What I'm saying is K.K.'s kinda the secret to my swole-ness, so thanks for helping bring him here!

Speaking of swole-ness, I wanted to compliment you on all that heavy stuff you're carrying. Go you!Your pockets are totally stuffed! I bet all that extra weight's REALLY maxing out your endurance gains.I had a heavy gift for you to help with both the K.K. thing and your training, but it doesn't look like you need it!
And speaking of both swole-ness and thanks, this is for you, .
I thought you might want something heavy to help with your endurance training. Oh, and also the K.K. thing!K.K. will come if we show enough spirit, so go flex your !
Hey, ! You're still getting the island fit to host a big K.K. Slider show, right?

Well, speaking of fit, I wanted to compliment you on how much heavy stuff you've been carrying. Go you!Your pockets look totally stuffed! I bet all that extra weight's REALLY maxing out your endurance gains.I had a heavy gift for you to help with both the K.K. thing and your training, but it doesn't look like you need it!
You've been doing so much heavy lifting for all of us that I got you a little present, .
You've been doing so much heavy lifting for us that I got you another little gift, .
I thought you might want something heavy to help with your endurance training. And also the K.K. thing!K.K. will come if we show enough spirit, so go flex your !

Don't get TOO pumped. It's only .An old workout buddy sent me an island-warming gift when I got here, but it was something I already had.I kinda felt bad so I just thanked her and put it away And now you own !
I thought you might appreciate a good hand workout. I hope you have fun making it!Now whenever folks ask about your ultra-buff fingers, you can just show off your !
